### Dyadic Interactions Simulation
This Shiny app generates data from several models that are used to analyze dyadic interactions. It supplements the paper "Statistical Techniques for Analyzing Dyadic Interactions" by S.W. Berkhout, N.K. Schuurman, and E.L. Hamaker.

#### Contact information
If you have any questions or comments, please contact S.W. Berkhout ([s.w.berkhout@uu.nl](mailto:s.w.berkhout@uu.nl)).
